main event: On 1 February 1954, a report was made concerning the sighting of an unidentified object over Puente, California, which appeared with silvery fuzzy edges, floating and rapidly rotating at high altitude.
interesting points: The object was observed to have little, if any, residue in the air, with only a small vapor trail visible., The sighting lasted approximately 20 seconds., Witness reports included descriptions of erratic flight paths and changes in shape., The object was observed by multiple witnesses, including military personnel., A substance resembling gossamer web was noted to mysteriously evaporate upon contact with air.
sighted object: unidentified aerial object with silvery fuzzy edges
witness description: various local residents including military personnel
